briefdescription.para: Creates a new server from launchd.

detaileddescription.para: launchd has allocaed a socket for us. We now query launchd for the file descriptor of this socket and create a server on it. In addition we inherit launchd's environment which holds a variable containing the path to the socket. This is used to init the server's address which is passed to autolaunched services.

parameterdescription.para: the environment variable which holds the unix path to the socket
location to store reason for failure.

simplesect.para: the new server, or NULL on failure.
